mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_attachment (business_type, business_id, file_name, file_path, file_size, file_type, upload_user, remark) VALUES (#{businessType}, #{businessId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{uploadUser}, #{remark})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sys_attachment WHERE business_type = #{businessType} AND business_id = #{businessId}
